page.title: 03Ivy Farm, Horningtoft
page.content: This farm is an arable and livestock farm, the arable side is barley and wheat and sometimes fields are let off to other farmers.The farmer owns 26 acres and this year it is 22 acres barley and 4 acres wheat and the actual farm buildings are 2 acres so it is quite big in all. The livestock side is pigs, the pigs are large whites bred on the farm and sold to various farmers who fatten them up for pork,but the farmer is thinking of fattening them up him- self. The farmer employs one helper to help him through the day because it is quite a busy job. There is not much machinery, only a plough and slurry tanker also two tractors and one trailer. Most other work is done by the neighbouring farmer on contract.
